page.title: 13WEEKEND VISITORS
page.content: The village is a favourite with visitors from Dundee and other towns around for short afternoon outings especially at the weekend. At the Craft Shop they browse among shelves loaded with materials for almost any form of Art or Craft or they enjoy coffee and homebaking in the Coffee Shop. Across the road at Henderson's market garden they buy bedding and greenhouse plants or tomatoes in season. The Craft Shop & Henderson's are so popular parked cars cause traffic problems at the north end of the village. Whittons Emporium has a large select- ion of new and second hand furniture while in the Square among Blackstocks second hand goods visitors hope to spot a bargain antique.
